flawed_nl_solution:
The team has won 40 x 70/100 = <<40*70/100=28>>28 games out of 40.
There a total of 40 + 10 = <<40+10=20>>20 games to be played.
The team has to win a total of is 20 x 60/100 = <<20*60/100=12>>12 games.
So, it still needs to win 12 - 28 = <<12-28=-16>>-16 more games.
Hence, they can still lose 10 - -16 = <<10--16=26>>26 games.
#### 26

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
